products.name: Pizza
products.detail: A slice of classic cheese pizza is one of life's greatest pleasures. While calling for delivery is always a treat, being able to make your own pizza recipes at home is even more satisfying.

products.name: Bread
products.detail: Milk bread (aka Hokkaido milk bread) is a slightly sweet Japanese white bread that is known for its super soft, fluffy texture.
